class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


enrollment limited to ENVS majors in their final semester who declared during/after Fall 2020. Email Katie Green (katie.green@emory.edu) for permission to enroll.
course_description: This course is required for all ENVS majors (BA and BS) in their final semester prior to graduation.During this course you will develop a capstone portfolio that includes  examples of past coursework and has written reflections evaluating your academic growth throughout the major.
schedule_location: F 12pm-12:50pm in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 4062, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 12-12:50p, Instructor: S. Donaher, Status: Open
